quote.issuer_name: China Next-Gen Commerce and Supply Chain Ltd.
quote.nm: China Next-Gen Commerce and Supply Chain Ltd.
quote.summary: China Next-Gen Commerce and Supply Chain Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the construction services and property investment business. It operates its businesses through two segments. The Construction Services segment is engaged in the provision of civil engineering works, building construction works and other ancillary services to government and commercial corporations. The Property Investment segment is engaged in the leasing of residential and industrial properties. The Company specializes in providing construction services and solutions in civil engineering, including road works, earthworks, drainage works, earth retaining stabilizing structures works and soil improvement works, building construction works mainly for industrial buildings, which include substructure works, piling works, addition and alteration works and electrical and mechanical works, other ancillary services which include logistics and transportation services of construction materials.
quote.office_address:
Unit A, 12th Floor
China Overseas Building
139 Hennessy Road
Wanchai, Hong Kong
